name: HeartbeatdowN
description:
HeartbeatdowN

2 player 2D pixel monster heart battles

Made for GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½ jam .
Started Monday 3rd July, finished Thursday 6th July.

Shoot your enemy to steal a heart.
Shoot and miss and you lose the heart, unless you can catch it again.

gamepadkeys 1keys 2leftstick  a⬅rightstick  ➡d⮕jumpAw⬆fireXspaceright ctrlshieldYs⬇
